title: Ticket #1003: End support for ia64_sles_8
description:
NMI is purging support for the ia64_sles_8 machine.

We need to purge it from all our NMI submit scripts so we never ask NMI to build/test on this platform anymore.
remarks:
2009-Nov-25 15:05:12 by matt:
In addition, we should identify any special #ifdef code for this platform, and schedule its removal.

2009-Nov-25 15:49:29 by psilord:
But, we should figure out #969 first.... as that might not be machine specific.

2009-Nov-30 16:21:41 by psilord:
Stalled due to figuring out #969. That other ticket might show a bug common to all platforms.

2010-Jan-08 16:18:45 by psilord:
poked Nick about the ticket this is waiting upon.

2010-Mar-17 14:40:09 by psilord:
I stomped #969 out like a cigarette butt. Time to take this ticket to the curb too.

2010-Mar-17 15:05:10 by psilord:
ia64_sles_8 has been removed from the master. Resolving.
check_ins:
2010-Apr-14 10:04   Check-in [25420]: Documented removal of ia64_sles_8 #1003 (By Peter Keller )
2010-Mar-17 15:02   Check-in [17650]: Stomped out ia64_sles_8 since we don't support it anymore. #1003 (By Peter Keller )
creator: tannenba
